item.title: Invisible Identities
item.description: The Cultures of Psychology are vast; nuance and diversity are the spearheads of what it means to understand intersectionality and its role within a culture. Still, one continues to come to mind that has not necessarily had its chance on stage: Invisible Identities. I believe the idea of invisible identities is profound. To me, all of my identities are invisible, making experiences for me very different from those that are seeable.
